description: This file provides a data service abstraction for a web application, handling user registration, login, session management, and request data operations. It supports both localStorage-based mock data and real backend interactions via Supabase, including environment configuration, data normalization, and request creation.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user, either via Supabase or local mock data, and initializes session.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user via Supabase or local mock data and sets session.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user, clearing session data.

methods.name: getCurrentUser
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user's info from Supabase or local storage.

methods.name: listRequests
methods.description: Fetches list of requests, normalizing vehicle and contact data, from Supabase or local storage.

methods.name: getRequestById
methods.description: Retrieves a specific request by ID.

methods.name: createRequest
methods.description: Creates a new request, normalizing vehicle and contact data, in Supabase or local storage.

methods.name: isSupabaseConfigured
methods.description: Checks if Supabase environment variables are set.
